Engineering-Grade Accuracy

You don't need to be a
civil engineer to understand
construction costs.

Zlendo Realty's AI Estimator uses real-world Indian construction logic—soil type, seismic zones, and material rates—to give you an estimate you can trust.

Estimate My Cost

Perfect for Homeowners & Architects

Real Engineering Logic. Not Just Math.

We calculate costs based on your specific site conditions.

City Material Rates

Labor & material costs vary by 15-20% between cities. We track local market rates daily.

Soil Type Analysis

Sandy, Clay, or Rocky? Soil type dictates foundation depth and budget adjustments.

Seismic Zones

Building in Zone V requires 25% more steel than Zone II. We factor this in automatically.

Market Fluctuations

Steel & cement prices change weekly. Our AI updates estimates in real-time.

Component Breakdown

Know exactly where
your money goes.

Most contractors give a single "Check per sq.ft" rate. Zlendo Realty breaks it down component by component, so you know you aren't overpaying.

Footing & Foundation12-15%
Super Structure (Columns/Beams)18-22%
Brickwork & Plastering15-18%
Flooring & Finishing20-25%
Electrical & Plumbing10-12%

Choose Your Quality

From functional to luxurious, define your standard.

economy
economy Class
  • Standard M20 / Red Brick
  • Standard Vitrified Tiles
  • Basic CP Fittings
  • Local Teak / Flush Doors
premium
premium Class
  • M25 / AAC or Wire Cut
  • Premium Vitrified / Granite
  • Branded (Jaquar/Kohler)
  • Veneer / Teak Finish
luxury
luxury Class
  • M30+ / Porotherm / AAC
  • Italian Marble / Hardwood
  • Luxury (Grohe/Toto)
  • Solid Teak Wood
Transparency First

AI that explains, not just calculates.

Most estimators give you a number. We tell you why.
If your foundation cost is higher, our AI explains:
"Because your soil is soft clay, we accounted for deeper pile foundations."

Transparent BOQ

Zero

Hidden Markups

AI
Based on your location in Indiranagar, Bangalore, and Sandy Soil conditions, we recommend an isolated footing foundation. This saves approx ₹45,000 vs pile foundation.
AI
Switching to AAC Blocks will reduce structural dead load by 35%, potentially lowering steel reinforcement costs by 5%.
